sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-dialog v-model="dialog" hide-overlay persistent width="300">
    <v-card color="primary" dark>
      <v-card-text>
        กรุณารอสักครู่ ...
        <v-progress-linear indeterminate color="white" class="mb-0"></v-progress-linear>
      </v-card-text>
    </v-card>
  </v-dialog>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  data() {
    return {
      dialog: false
    };
  },
  methods: {
    show() {
      this.dialog = true;
      setTimeout(() => (this.dialog = false), 4000);
    },
    close() {
      this.dialog = false;
    }
  }
};
</script>
